title: DEV REBIRTH: Cyberpunk Discipline Tracker (Dev vs Distraction)

requirements.text: Implement the global cyberpunk/futuristic military UI theme exactly as specified: color palette (#0B0F14 background, #111826 cards, #00F0FF primary neon, #7A00FF secondary neon, #00FF9C success, #FF3B3B warning, #E6EDF3 primary text, #9FB3C8 secondary text), typography (Orbitron for headings/day counter, Rajdhani for buttons/UI labels, Exo 2 for paragraph/log text), ALL CAPS for main headings, and slightly expanded spacing to match a serious high-tech console style (no cute/playful visuals).

quotes: The app should feel like a futuristic military/cyberpunk developer console, not a cute habit tracker.
Color palette (use exactly)

Font system

Use futuristic military/cyber fonts:

Headings & Day Counter: Orbitron
Buttons & UI text: Rajdhani
Paragraph/log text: Exo 2

Use ALL CAPS for main headings like:
DAY 01
REALITY CHECK
DISCIPLINE SCORE

acceptanceCriteria: All screens use the specified hex colors for backgrounds, cards, accents, success, and warning states.
Orbitron, Rajdhani, and Exo 2 are loaded and applied to the specified text categories.
Primary section headings render in ALL CAPS with increased letter spacing.
UI feels minimal, sharp, and console-like (no rounded bubbly components, no playful iconography).

constraints: Use only the specified color palette values exactly as provided.
